attributes.action: Explain why they do nothing to help U.K. truck drivers jailed abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As members of the road transport industry we would like to know why the P.M. finds it totally acceptable to do nothing while innocent U.K. drivers are jailed abroad without trial. When will the government step in and provide answers to families. If we were all company directors or doctors we are sure that we would at least get a lot more help from the government.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
